participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful, passionate about nature and art, enjoys meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: I tend to drop things when my stomach is empty. I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be. My guilty pleasure is McDonald's. I am really excited to see how Game of Thrones ends. I like the music group the Backstreet Boys.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring, adventurous, loves sharing knowledge and experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I decided to travel the world with my sister, Mary. I dream of winning the lottery. I love to share my passion for art with my students. I read a lot and spend my time on community activities. My husband is a soldier in the US Army.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I'm just excited to see how game of thrones ends.
Oh I know right! I can't wait!
I love art and I love to share my passion with my students.
That's so awesome! I love reading and spending my time on community activities.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of the United States.
Oh that sounds interesting! I love history.
Me too! I also love to travel.
I would love to travel the world!
Me too! I decided to travel the world with my sister, Mary.
That's so awesome! I'm glad you have a travel buddy.
Thanks! My husband is a soldier in the US Army so he's usually gone.
Oh I see. That must be hard.
It is sometimes but I know he's doing important work.
Thanks! What do you do for a living
